products.name: Halfmoon Betta
products.description: The Halfmoon betta is arguably one of the prettiest betta species. It is recognized by its large tail that can flare up to 180 degrees.

products.name: Dragon Scale Betta
products.description: The dragon scale betta is a rarer and higher maintenance fish. It is named by its thick white scales covering his sides that looks like dragon scale armor.
